holidays.name: International Dance Day
holidays.description: A celebration of dance as an art form, promoting its diversity and universality across cultures.
holidays.origin: Established in 1982 by the International Dance Council (CID) to honor the birth of Jean-Georges Noverre, the creator of modern ballet.
holidays.funFact: Each year, a famous dancer or choreographer writes a message for International Dance Day to inspire dancers worldwide.

holidays.origin: Originated in Italian-American communities and recognized informally by food enthusiasts today.

holidays.name: Kiss of Love Day
holidays.description: An unofficial day encouraging people to celebrate love publicly and combat moral policing, often involving public displays of affection.
holidays.origin: Started in India around 2014 as a social movement to protest against moral policing and conservative restrictions on public affection.
holidays.funFact: It often sparks lively debates and media attention in countries with strict public decency codes.
